Welcome

Immediate Alerts and Insight

Receive alerts on outages, low inventory, refunds, and more. We watch your shop 24/7, so you can resolve issues before they become critical.

Customized Monitoring

ShopStatus automatically monitors pages critical to your shop's function, lets you watch multiple stores, track your apps, theme changes and more.

View Historic Information

Track the shop status over time charts, and read past updates so you can determine if your site needs an overhaul before it costs you lost sales.

Professional Status Monitoring for Shopify

Stop worrying about what you don’t know. ShopStatus monitors your Shopify site and sends you alerts when we detect trouble. If there's an outage you'll be the first to know, so you or your developer can resolve problems and get your shop back up and running – before losing sales or sending ad traffic to a broken site.

Total Coverage, Total Peace of Mind

We monitor your shopping cart, collections pages, and homepage by default. Add monitors for other critical pages, custom domains, apps, inventory levels, and even daily refund thresholds. When we detect a change that may jeopardize your business you'll receive an alert, along with updates when the status changes again.

Don't Lose Sales to Downtime

Most store owners don't realize outages when they occur. Problems happen, and they often cost sales or lead to public ridicule. Be proactive with 24/7 coverage and alerts. ShopStatus keeps you informed so you can focus on other aspects of your business – for the cost of a few cups of coffee per month.

A Must for anyone who takes their Shopify business seriously.
